statements: SELECT * FROM student_attendance
SELECT student_id, attendance_status FROM student_attendance WHERE class_id = 1
SELECT class_id, participation_score FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present'
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE participation_score > 80
SELECT student_id, class_id, attendance_status FROM student_attendance
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status='Present' ORDER BY student_id ASC, class_id DESC
SELECT student_id, attendance_status FROM student_attendance WHERE participation_score > 80 ORDER BY participation_score DESC
SELECT MAX(participation_score) AS max_score, AVG(participation_score) AS avg_score FROM student_attendance
SELECT student_id, class_id, participation_score FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 102 OR (class_id = 101 AND attendance_status = 'Absent')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students, MAX(participation_score) AS highest_score FROM student_attendance
SELECT * FROM student_attendance
SELECT student_id, attendance_status FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present'
SELECT class_date, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE class_id = 101
SELECT student_id, participation_score FROM student_attendance ORDER BY participation_score DESC
SELECT student_id, class_id, attendance_status, participation_score FROM student_attendance JOIN class_schedule ON student_attendance.class_id = class_schedule.class_id
SELECT student_id, class_id, attendance_status FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT class_id, class_date, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE class_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT student_id, class_id, participation_score FROM student_attendance WHERE participation_score > 80 ORDER BY participation_score DESC;
SELECT class_id, class_date, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule ORDER BY class_date ASC, start_time DESC;
SELECT student_id, class_id, attendance_status, participation_score FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status IN ('Present', 'Absent') AND participation_score <= 50;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT class_id, class_name, class_description FROM Classes;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE is_present = true;
SELECT student_name, class_name, attendance_date FROM Students JOIN Attendance ON Students.student_id = Attendance.student_id JOIN Classes ON Attendance.class_id = Classes.class_id;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT class_name FROM Classes ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, class_name FROM Students JOIN Attendance ON Students.student_id = Attendance.student_id JOIN Classes ON Attendance.class_id = Classes.class_id;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, class_topic FROM classes ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS attendance_count FROM attendance GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, class_id, participation_score FROM participation WHERE participation_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, class_topic FROM classes WHERE class_name LIKE 'Math%';
SELECT student_id, class_id, date FROM attendance WHERE is_present = true ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, participation_score FROM students INNER JOIN participation ON students.student_id = participation.student_id ORDER BY participation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT class_name, teacher_id FROM classes ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_id, count(class_id) FROM enrollments GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT class_name, teacher_id FROM classes ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, class_id FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE status = TRUE ORDER BY date ASC;
